product_name: Belknap's Waterproof Grand Canyon River Guide - 3rd Edition
long_description: Planning a float trip down the Colorado River? Be sure to take along this handy, waterproof river guide! Authors: Bill Belknap, Loie Belknap Evans, Lynn Evans Peesel, Meribeth Riffey and Douglas W. Schwartz. Softcover; 111 pages; full-color photographs and maps. Westwater Books; copyright 2007. Get your feet wet with a few basics, like learning the difference between an eddy and a hole, or a tongue from a sleeper. More than just a book of maps, you'll earn about the geology, history and archaeology of the Grand Canyon and the Colorado River. Waterproof pages can get wet without fear of falling apart.
short_description: Planning a float trip down the Colorado River? Be sure to take along this handy, waterproof river guide!
